name: LeapofFaith
0:
”Alexa, open leap of faith”
”Alexa, start leap of faith”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: leap of faith
des:
Start your day with an inspirational list of bible verses. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created Chalkface Productions.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
